simplenlg.framework.NLGModule

Packages that use NLGModule
simplenlg.aggregation   
simplenlg.format.english The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English. 
simplenlg.morphology.english This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language. 
simplenlg.orthography.english The orthography package currently contains only a single class, the Orthography Processor for English. 
simplenlg.realiser.english   
simplenlg.syntax.english This package contains the necessary classes for running the syntax processor for the English language.
